definition: rare/not familiar (to the speaker)/sth rarely experience/hard to see
few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
lit. rarely seen, very strange (idiom); to express amazement due to lack of experience/naive expression of excitement due to ignorance

sentences.english: Although solitary accessory spleen is not uncommon, multiple accessory spleens are rare.
sentences.chinese: 虽然单一性副脾并非不常见，但多发性副脾仍属少见。

sentences.english: Characteristic of 060714 rainfall and floodwater is unfrequent in many rainfall and floodwater of the Helan Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 其特性在贺兰山暴雨洪水中是历次上少见的。

sentences.english: Epidural migration of a sequestrated disc to posterior epidural space is rare.
sentences.chinese: 游离的髓核移位至后方硬膜外间隙是非常少见的。

sentences.english: In China it is rare to see a knife on the dinner table.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，餐桌上放一把刀是极其少见的现象。

sentences.english: The disease is not rare in clinic, but it is often misdiagnosed and patients have to be reoperated on.
sentences.chinese: 该病临床并非少见，但既往易被误诊而遭再次手术。

sentences.english: A rarer gin hand is two sequences of five cards each.
sentences.chinese: 比较少见的“金”是手中有两副顺子，每副五张牌。

sentences.english: There were a few langerhans cells, and his cytoplasmic processes were less and short.
sentences.chinese: 郎格罕细胞较少见，胞质突起少而短。

sentences.english: Tsang's family was there on behalf of excellence, is an extremely rare within the four seas Changsheng house.
sentences.chinese: 曾氏家族却代有英才，是海内极为少见的长盛之家。

sentences.english: Trichothiodystrophy is a rare hair disorder inherited in an autosomal recessive pattern.
sentences.chinese: 毛发缺硫性失养症为一少见的常染色体隐性毛发疾病。

sentences.english: CT Hyperdense dermoids are extremely rare.
sentences.chinese: CT上高密度的皮样囊肿是非常少见。

sentences.english: The sight of youngsters speaking Chinese in the Mexican heartland is unusual, to say the least.
sentences.chinese: 在墨西哥内陆腹地学汉语的青少年以前绝对少见。

sentences.english: Carpal tunnel syndrome secondary to gout is uncommon.
sentences.chinese: 腕管综合征继发性痛风是少见。

sentences.english: Very occasionally comes a Jairzinho's body moment.
sentences.chinese: 有关雅伊尔津霍体格这样的时候非常少见。

sentences.english: Less-common side effects include fever, vomiting, and diarrhea.
sentences.chinese: 较少见的副作用包括发烧，呕吐，腹泻。

sentences.english: Conclusions Primary small bowel tumor is uncommon and easy to be misdiagnosed.
sentences.chinese: 结论原发性小肠肿瘤少见，容易误诊。

sentences.english: It was seldom seen in Chinese history that such as the four couples of blood sisters were married to the same man.
sentences.chinese: 四对姐妹同嫁一人，这在中国历史上还是少见的。

definition: lit. as rare as phoenix feathers and unicorn horns (idiom)/fig. few and far between
for the most part/many/most/the greater part/mostly
